channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Svein Rosseland
item.description: Svein Rosseland (March 31, 1894, in Kvam, Hardanger – January 19, 1985, in Bærum) was a Norwegian astrophysicist and a pioneer in the field of theoretical astrophysics.
